Description: On I-95 at mile marker 136.1 in the County of Stafford, motorists can expect delays due to a disabled tractor trailer. The south right shoulder is closed.

Description: On US-58 in the County of Brunswick, in the vicinity of Dornia Ave; Rt. 657N/S (Brunswick County), motorists can expect delays due to a tractor trailer crash. All east lanes are closed. All west lanes are closed.
